dialogue.start: It's all coming back to me! I remember skipping through the woods by "__(MAP_ZONE)__", and I dropped, or should I say saw a necklace exactly like the one you're talking about on the ground, and this huge gnoll picked it up and ran back to his camp. I'm sure if you ask for it back they'll give it back.
dialogue.active: Fantastic pie, but as I told you, the big scary gnoll took it. Get it and take it to that old lady.
dialogue.r_completed: My family necklace! I never thought I'd see it again, thank you so much dear. Here, take this. This was my husband's lucky sword, if only he took with him on his last campaign!
